definition: area particularly hard-hit by a disaster/disaster area

sentences.english: The government already has started planning a three-year rebuilding effort for the areas damaged by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 政府已開始針對地震災區制定爲期三年的重建計劃。

sentences.english: Considering the losses in the disaster area, our support was an utterly inadequate measure.
sentences.chinese: 比起災區的損失，我們的支援不過杯水車薪。

sentences.english: Jet Li has decided to quit acting for a year to focus on disaster relief and reconstruction of quake-hit areas.
sentences.chinese: 李連杰決定息影一年，專注賑災及災區重建工作。

sentences.english: I heard that a mass campaign encouraging show love to the victims of earthquake-stricken area is now widespread.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說爲地震災區的災民獻愛心的活動在廣泛開展。

sentences.english: The United States has been hit hard by the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 美國是此次經濟危機的重災區。

sentences.english: The earthquake-hit regions will be exempt from the hike, the central bank said.
sentences.chinese: 央行還表示地震重災區法人金融機構暫不漲價。

sentences.english: China's air force dropped tons of disaster relief materials into the quake-stricken area.
sentences.chinese: 空軍爲災區空投了數噸的救災物災。

sentences.english: Urgently allocating and transporting central medical reserve to support quake-hit areas.
sentences.chinese: 一是緊急調運中央醫藥儲備支援災區。

sentences.english: The Red Cross administrates aid in disaster areas.
sentences.chinese: 紅十字會在災區實施救助。

sentences.english: "Vitality Home" was always in disaster area after 512.
sentences.chinese: “生命力家園”在512地震之後一直紮根在災區。

sentences.english: A navy warship has arrived near the disaster area carrying tents and food supplies.
sentences.chinese: 一艘載有帳篷和食品供給的軍艦已抵達災區附近。

sentences.english: The number of volunteers assisting those people living in the earthquake-hit area is surprising.
sentences.chinese: 正在幫助那些地震災區的人們的志願者人數大得驚人。

sentences.english: That was our small token of the contribution that we can provide to those who have suffered from this great tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們能向損失慘重的災區人民略表的一點心意。

sentences.english: Early warning could enable the government to allocate(11) money and resources to potential disaster areas before disaster strikes.
sentences.chinese: 早期預警可以使政府提前發配物資到潛在災區。

sentences.english: In Thailand, Tzu Chi volunteers arrive in the southern province of Phatthalung to survey damage caused by a recent flood.
sentences.chinese: 在泰國，慈濟人來到博他倫府省水患災區勘災。

sentences.english: The Chinese people have launched an all-out rescue and repair effort in disaster-stricken areas.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民已全力以赴展開一場災區營救和恢復工作。

definition: to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
to express sympathy, greetings, consolation etc
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
